scientistDialogue0.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue0.text: You need to speak English! You’re in England!

scientistDialogue0.name: nomJoueur
scientistDialogue0.text: (Quoi ? Qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ? Je croyais que c’était une machine pour la météo, pas de téléportation…)

scientistDialogue0.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue0.text: You are there because my machine worked hahaha!

scientistDialogue0.name: nomJoueur
scientistDialogue0.text: (Elle avait parlé de météo. Qu’est-ce qu’elle me chante ?)

scientistDialogue0.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue0.text: Yes it is. I’ve taken some French lessons before. What did you think it was?

scientistDialogue0.name: nomJoueur
scientistDialogue0.text: Something with the sun, the clouds…

scientistDialogue0.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue0.text: A weather machine? Weird. It already exists. Anyway, there’s something wrong with it.

scientistDialogue0.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue0.text: Yes. Something broke. Can you take a look?

scientistDialogue1.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue1.text: That’s a problem. I have no idea where it could have fallen, or when, because you traveled through time.

scientistDialogue2.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue2.text:
How interesting!
You’ve met the famous Mycroft.

scientistDialogue2.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue2.text:
The elusive Mycroft Holmes!
He works for the Queen’s secret service. Doyle wrote about him.

scientistDialogue2.name: Scientist
scientistDialogue2.text:
No worries, you have a tablet with you.
You’ll be able to keep track of all the people you meet.
explanationWord: to make certain that you know what is happening or has happened.
